sources.title: Kiss of the Tarantula (1975) DRIVE-IN SHOCKER
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Suzanna Ling, Eric Mason, Herman Wallner
Director: Chris Munger

Carrie meets Willard in this Drive-In Shocker about a tormented teen who lives in a mortuary and keeps deadly creepy crawlies as her pets. 

TRIVIA: featured in Michael J. Weldon's Psychotronic Encyclopedia of Film, an 815-page compilation of mini-reviews of over 3,000 cult films.

metadata.Plot: John Bradley, a mortician lives in a large house with his cold, heartless wife and daughter Susan, where he runs his business . He is unaware that his wife is having an affair with his very own brother and they plot to kill him for life insurance money. His daughter Susan, who has a fascination with tarantulas on the other hand finds out and decides to teach her mother a lesson, which results in her death. Fueled by that incident Susan use her tarantulas to seek vengeance on everyone who is ever wronged her and her father.
metadata.Actors: Ernesto Macias, Suzanna Ling, Herman Wallner
